safetyTips: Our boxes are delivered by courier. When they are returned to us they are left unopened for 48 hours before each toy is individually cleaned.
name: Toy Box Tots
description: We deliver book-themed toy boxes from Dulwich to anywhere in the UK. You can borrow toys for 3 nights, 7 nights, 2 weeks or a month, or you can sign up for a monthly subscription. We cater for children from 6 months to 5 years old and promise lots of fun with each delivery. Once you're done, return the toys but keep the box.
